greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The Fibonacci Champernowne sequence.
comment: Uses Fibonacci Maximal notation: headings are (..., 13, 8, 5, 3, 2, 1) filling in terms from the right.
Minimal notation fills in from the left. 8 in Fibonacci Maximal = (1011) = (5 + 2 + 1), whereas 8 in Minimal = (1100) = (5 + 3).
formula: Write n in Fibonacci Maximal notation and juxtapose.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 02 2010
